config.name: Joomla Registration
config.author: JoomlaXi
config.description: Joomla Registration Action collects the form data, and registers the user at your site.
config.help:
You are not required to use all the fields, which are displayed in Joomla Registration. You can register users in the following way.
  • By Email Id Only : In this case you need to show only Email field, user will be registered with email and random password. In this case usenrame and name will contain the email id.
  • By Email Id and Password : By this user will be registerd with email id and the password selected by user. In this case usenrame and name will contain the email id.
  • By Username, Email and Password
  • By Name, Username, Email, Password
  • By Name, Username, Email, Re-type Email, Password, Re-type Password
config.code:
<form name="form_name" method="POST" action="form_post_url" >

		Username:    <input type="text" size="15" name="username" />

		Email   :    <input type="text" size="15" name="email" />

		password:   <input type="password" size="15" name="password" />
		
	                           <input type="submit" name="submit" value="Submit" />

</form>
